name: Dream of the Glowing Umbrella
description:
This game was made for the game jam Ludum dare 48 in Compo.

Descriptions

A peculiar dream of jumping on rooftops trying to catch butterflies with a glowing umbrella...

There's generated levels, and when you fall down there's multiple levels bellow that you play instead of restarting.

Controls

  • Move - WASD
  • Jump & Umbrella - Space

Twitter: https://twitter.com/HristoeL 

Tools

  • Game engine - Construct 2
  • Sound effects - sfxr
  • Ambience - Sunvox
  • Pixel art - Aseprite
